pages.text: To generalize, there are 4 categories of "machine":$(li)Generators make energy$(li)Cables move energy$(li)Battery Boxes store energy$(li)Machines spend energy$(br2)On the right, a $(item)Basic Generator$() is making Zaps, $(item)LV Cables$() are sending it to an $(item)LV Battery Box$(), and then to a $(item)Macerator$() and $(item)Powered Furnace$().
